name: Dungeon Dyslexia
blurb: A hybrid dungeon crawler/word game where the hero has lost his memory and must struggle to remember his attacks and abilities.

rewards.reward: No Reward
VILLAGER\r\n ============================== \r\nA Backer credit in the in-game credits and on our website.

[EARLY BIRD!] HERO'S APPRENTICE\r\n============================== \r\nThank you for being here early! Get everything in the $20 tier: A digital copy of Dungeon Dyslexia on launch, a copy of our first game, Borealis, and all previous rewards (Backer credit)
FORGETFUL ADVENTURER\r\n============================== \r\nA digital copy of Dungeon Dyslexia on launch, a copy of our first game, Borealis, and all previous rewards (Backer credit)

BAFFLED BARD
============================== 
A postcard depicting a random piece of Dungeon Dyslexia concept art signed by the dev team, plus all previous rewards (digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit) 
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

CONFUSED CONJURER (DIGITAL ONLY)\r\n============================== \r\nDigital Soundtrack + Dungeon Dyslexia prequel short story plus all previous digital rewards (digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)

CONFUSED CONJURER\r\n============================== Digital Soundtrack + Dungeon Dyslexia prequel short story plus all previous rewards (postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit) ============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

DUMBSTRUCK DUNGEONEER (DIGITAL ONLY)\r\n============================== A digital edition of the Making Of art and design book for Dungeon Dyslexia plus all previous digital rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)

DUMBSTRUCK DUNGEONEER
==============================
A digital edition of the Making Of art and design book for Dungeon Dyslexia plus all previous digital rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

ECCENTRIC EXPLORER (DIGITAL ONLY)\r\n==============================\r\nA special thanks credit, plus all previous rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)

ECCENTRIC EXPLORER
==============================
A special thanks credit, plus all previous rewards (digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

FAROUT FOOTMAN
==============================
Get an extra playable character, the Footman, in the final release of Dungeon Dyslexia, plus all previous rewards (special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

DUNGEON DYSLEXIC
==============================
A weapon of your design will be added to the game, plus all previous rewards (the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $5 for shipping outside continental U.S.

HERO'S MEMORY
==============================
Receive a Dungeon Dyslexia t-shirt plus all previous rewards (in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

EXCALIBUR
==============================
An action of your choice will be added to the game, plus all previous rewards (t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

MJOLNIR
==============================
A very special thanks credit, plus all previous rewards (in-game action of your choice, t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

LEVEL BOSS
==============================
An in-game enemy of your choice will be added to the game, plus all previous rewards (very special thanks, in-game action of your choice, t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

BLACK SWORDSMAN
==============================
Receive a copy of the game with cheats unlocked, plus all previous rewards (in-game enemy of your choice, very special thanks, in-game action of your choice, t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $10 for shipping outside continental U.S.

THE HERO
==============================
Get a producer credit, plus DOUBLE of all previous rewards (cheats unlocked, in-game enemy of your choice, very special thanks, in-game action of your choice, t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
============================== IMPORTANT: Fee $20 for shipping outside continental U.S.

SAVIOR\r\n==============================\r\nDD Developer and Producer Andrew Stanek will fly anywhere in the world to thank you personally, the Hero will be named after you, a "Savior" credit, and all previous rewards (double of all previous rewards, cheats unlocked, in-game enemy of your choice, very special thanks, in-game action of your choice, t-shirt, in-game weapon of your choice, the footman, special thanks, digital soundtrack, short story, postcard, digital copy on launch, Borealis, Backer credit)
